sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effectiveness of health education on HIV/AIDS-related knowledge, attitude, and performance (KAP) in Jianghua Yao Autonomous County.
sentences.chinese: 目的对江华县开展艾滋病防治健康教育进行效果评价。

sentences.english: Huaxian-Lantian fault is a prequaternary bedrock fault.

sentences.english: Objective To understand epidemical situation of Gnathostoma spinigerum in Wuhua county of Guangdong province.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解广东省五华县棘颚口线虫的流行情况。

sentences.english: First of all, the author introduced the Xihua County and Nv Wa city.
sentences.chinese: 首先简要介绍了西华县及女娲城。
